name: Interactive CV (Tobias Jakob | YuisHeaven)
description:
Interactive CV is a personal project where I've transformed my typical CV (Curriculum Vitae) information into an engaging 2D platformer prototype.

Available on Desktop: Windows, Linux

I'm always open to feedback and suggestions for future projects, including the possibility of creating a 3D version of the game. Thank you for playing and I hope you enjoy the experience!
